name: PARSE
description: The population of the Ancient system was occupied.Your task is to protect yourself from the invaders in an attempt to save as much as possible a story about yourself.You - a system whose population consists of engineers and programmers, your story is stored on your own inventions / projects - is the best way to keep it and never forget...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: AMD FX-8320 Eight Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon R7 360 Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: ASUS Xonar DSX
